mapper.sql: id, question, answer, fileUrl, createDate, updateDate
mapper.insert:
insert into aik_commonProblem
id,
question,
answer,
fileUrl,
createDate,
updateDate,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update aik_commonProblem
question = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
answer = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fileUrl = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateDate = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update aik_commonProblem set question = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, answer = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fileUrl = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateDate = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from aik_commonProblem where 1=1
and locate(#{question}, question) > 0
order by createDate desc
